text: The International Federation for Equestrian Sports (, FEI) is the international governing body of equestrian sports. It started in 1921. Its president is since 14 December 2014. Its headquarters are in Lausanne, Switzerland. == Disciplines == There are six disciplines (kinds of sports) under FEI: * Dressage and para-dressage * and para-driving * * * Show jumping * Reining was under FEI from 2000 to 2021. Horse racing, polo or other equestrian sports are not under FEI. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1921 establishments * Category:International sports organizations based in Switzerland Category:Organizations based in Lausanne
title: International Federation for Equestrian Sports
